Types
FCAP

CBaseEntity caps (CBaseEntity::ObjectCaps())

Values

(1) Custom save method

FCAP_ACROSS_TRANSITION

(2) Across transition

(4) Must spawn

(-2147483648) Don't save

(8) Impulse use

FCAP_CONTINUOUS_USE

(16) Continuous use

FCAP_ONOFF_USE

(32) On/off use

FCAP_DIRECTIONAL_USE

(64) Directional use

FCAP_MASTER

(128) Is a master

FCAP_FORCE_TRANSITION

(128) Force transition
